mng: to press, to push down, to keep under (control), pressure
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]

exm.mng: from the start, absolutely, entirely, simply
to oppress, to repress, to constrict, oppression, stress (physics)
hyperbaric oxygen, hyperbaric oxygenation, also abbr. for 高壓氧治療|高压氧治疗[gao1 ya1 yang3 zhi4 liao2], hyperbaric therapy
to constrain or repress emotions, oppressive, stifling, depressing, repression
